loans.name: Faustina

texts.en:
Faustina is 34 year old. She is single and has no children. She is a trader and has rented a shop in Bubiashie where she sells provisions, toiletries, and plastic water sachets. 

Faustina has been selling water sachets for the past 5 years. She has sales girls who sell the water at bus terminals for a daily wage, while she sells some in her shop. She sells about 20 bags of water a day. 

With this loan, Faustina will be able to buy more bags of sachet water to resell.

loans.use: to purchase more plastic sachets of water to resell.

loans.name: Tahzeem

texts.en: Tahzeem is a 37 year old married woman and a mother of four children. She deals in a business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. For the improvement of her business, Tahzeem has requested a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to expand her business and income level.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is forty four years old. she is married with three children between the ages of twelve and seventeen years. Her husband is a commercial driver and is very supportive with their children's school fees. Joyce is a seamstress and also sells sachet water. She has been selling sachet water for five years now. According to her, the sachet water business moves faster than tailoring. 

She will use this loan to purchase more sachet water and sell to increase her income. She believes that in years to come her sachet water business will grow and expand.

loans.use: To buy bags of sachet water and resell it to her customers

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.en:
Rogelio is a farmer residing in the town of Talibon, Bohol. He toils the land and grows rice.  Aside from that, he also engages in rendering motorcycle transport services to the locals in his community. He is married man with an 8 year old child. He needs capital to finance his motorcycle services.

He  is asking for a loan to buy tires, grease and other maintenance needed, like overhaul. These enable him to improve the way he caters for his transportation services. This creates less hassle and provides for a smooth ride.

With these, he will be able to earn more and set aside some savings. Thus, providing her family with good food.
He is hoping that he will be handling both his businesses successfully for sustainable living.

loans.use: to buy tires, grease and other maintenance items needed to keep his motorcycle running well

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of animal feed so he can educate his children

loans.name: Felister

texts.en:
Felister 30 years old, supports a family of five members. She has been practicing small scale farming for the last 10 years, earning an income of KES 14,000. 

Felister has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy a dairy cow. She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children and expand her farming. Her future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine, 52 years old, is married and blessed with 6 children. She is a farmer who has been growing cash crops to sell. She will use the loan from Vision Fund Kenya to buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm. She hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell. Josephine plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. Her future hopes are to improve her farming, make more income and support her family.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer to enable her to get more farm produce to sell and support her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new fridge or use to meet the customers demand.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en: This woman is 38 years old and her name is Anna. After graduating State Linguistic University and receiving specialization of German and English Language teaching, she started her pedagogical activities. Anna is married and she has two school-aged sons. Her husband works in the military. Ann gives paid private courses of English Language and Literature to pupils who are going to have entrance examinations. She works with 5 pupils and teaches correct grammar, proper phonetics and rich vocabulary. With this loan Anna wants to buy professional literature and a computer as it very necessary for her courses. She is sure that with the new program that she plans to use, her pupils will have the best results for their exams.

loans.use: to buy professional literature and a computer for her private teaching courses

loans.name: Big Fish Group

texts.en:
One of the most challenging but rewarding endeavours a woman can undertake is raising a family and running a business at the same time. Both are full-time commitments that demand a whole lot of patience, perseverance, passion and love. Doing one or the other on its own can be a challenge, but Theresa, who is an entrepreneurial minded woman has been doing both. It is quite impressive how Theresa’s 17 year old tailoring business has survived the test of time, where other businesses have fallen due to economic hardships. She specialises in sewing kids and ladies clothes, and supplies various shops and boutiques.

Theresa gets her inspiration from her two children who desire a better future for their family. At the age of 38, she has run her business successfully, however, she has been lacking funding to expand her business. With the help from Thrive Microfinance (in the form of training and loans), Theresa’s business has grown. She has moved from sewing from her home to renting her own space in the city of Harare. With her group of three other women, called Big Fish, these ladies are applying for their second loan and so far they have a good payment history. They are hoping that a loan from Kiva will help them expand their businesses further and employ a few more people from their community.

loans.use: To expand her tailoring business and take on more employees to meet demand

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Francisco está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, una zona rural, aun en crecimiento, donde todas están dispuestas a poder crecer y mejorar sus vidas.
Las señoras son luchadoras y están poniendo todo de sí, pero entre ellas se destaca la Sra. Teodora, quien se dedica a la cría de gallinas. Comenta que por medio de su humilde trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar gallinas para la cría y también para la compra de balanceados, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo y su lucha diaria. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y mejorando.
texts.en:
San Francisco Group is in its first loan cycle in the women's bank program.  It's in the city of Curuguaty, a rural area that's still growing.  All the members are ready to be able to grow and improve their lives.  The women are persevering and they're giving it their all.

Teodora stands out in this group.  She earns a living raising chickens.  She said she her modest job gives her the means to be able to help her family.

She's requesting this loan so she can buy chickens to raise as well as balanced feed.  That way she can continue with her job and her daily struggle.

Teodora's grateful for this opportunity to be able to keep growing and improving.

loans.use: to buy chickens to raise and balanced feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers, so as to increase soil fertility for a better agricultural produce and meet client and family needs.

loans.name: Wilder Alberto

texts.es:
Wilder tiene 43 años de edad, vive en casa propia en el distrito de Oyotún, la cual es una zona rural que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en esta comunidad es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de animales.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de construcción como albañil, realiza esta actividad desde hace 3 años por lo que es conocido por la labor que realiza y cuenta con clientes que brindan buenas referencias de el. Solicita préstamo para la compra de herramientas como son tablas, andamios, baldes, entre otros, para realizar su trabajo, esto con la finalidad de brindar mejores servicio a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Wilder is 43 years old. He lives in a house he owns in the Oyotún district, which is a rural area located in the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. Life is calm in this community, and the inhabitants work mainly in commerce and animal husbandry.

He makes a living providing construction services, which he has done for the past three years. He is known for his work and has customers that provide him with good references. He is requesting a loan to purchase tools like planks, scaffolding, buckets, etc. to complete his work. He wants to provide better service to his customers, which will have a positive impact on his income level and improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase tools like planks, scaffolding, buckets, etc. to complete his work

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en: Christopher is a 35-year-old married man with five children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He owns rentals and builds houses as his main businesses. He is faced with challenges of limited capital to expand his rentals to include self-contained rooms. However, he has a vision of having many rental houses that will fetch him more income. He has asked for a loan to buy building materials like iron sheets, nails and timber to use for construction.

loans.use: to buy building materials like iron sheets, nails, and timber to use for construction.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To boost her clothes business by buying more stock of clothes for sale, so she can serve her clients better

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to restock the missing items in her food store.

loans.name: Roquella

texts.en:
Roquella is a married woman with six children. Her oldest child is 23 and the youngest is 10. She owns a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells items like coffee, sugar, shampoo, biscuits, canned goods,seasonings, and many others. She has been running the store for five years now. She needs additional capital to maintain the stocks of her store.

She has requested a loan to buy soft drinks, canned goods, and feed. These are essential resources that would augment her earnings, improve her store inventory, and also provide her more customers to shop the variety of goods. Thus it would result in higher income and she would be able to expand her business.
 
Roquella would like to handle her business well for a sustainable livelihood.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, canned goods, and feed

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is a 46-year-old single parent with two children between the ages of 19 and 29. She has a sachet water business and has done this business for two years. She has eight sales girls who take the water to bus terminals and schools to sell for a daily wage.

With this loan, she will be able to buy more water, sell it, and increase her income. She will use the profit she makes from the water sales to pay for the educational expenses of her 19-year-old son who has gained admission to the university.

loans.use: To buy more sachet water and sell to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers to increase soil fertility

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase furniture and computers for her school.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase motorcycle spare parts for repair and maintenance so as to meet client needs in transport services.

loans.name: Sekar Pelangi Group

texts.en:
The Sekar Pelangi Group is led by the 45-year-old farmer Ketut, who is standing at the far left, pointing his two thumbs up and wearing eyeglasses. The other farmers in the group are Gede, Komang, Ketut, Wayan, Udin, Ketut, Putu, Kadek, Haru and Ketut. Two of Sekar Pelangi members could not attend the photo-taking process. They are posing in front of a pig cage and all of them live in a small village in Sumbawa Besar District, Sumbawa Island, Indonesia. Ketut himself has a family with two children. 

Ketut strives to improve his family economic conditions and has an intense desire to assist many poor farmers at his village. He runs a small scale rice farming operation and also has a small pig fattening business. He also works as a local government official in his village. However, he was troubled with the high price of non-renewable cooking gas and seeing pig dung wasted without further processing and polluting the water in his village. His farmland also was infertile because of too many chemical fertilizers.

After hearing from Yayasan Rumah Energi and Paroso Mason Group (a local business, founded by Yayasan Rumah Energi, a biogas construction partner) about the Household Biogas (BIRU) program, Ketut saw that biogas is a good solution to his problem. He saw opportunity to reduce his dependence on non-renewable cooking gas. In addition, he also wants to use bio-slurry (biogas residue) for his plants to increase revenue and to reduce soil damage to his farmland. Thereafter, he invited ten of his friends to form a farmer group. Ketut feels enthusiastic about purchasing a bio-digester, but he does not have sufficient capital for it. A loan from Kiva will help him and other group members to make it possible.

He is optimistic that he can build a bio-digester. He can use the bio-gas for cooking and bio-slurry as fertilizer for his plantation. He hopes that, in the future, he can invite all the farmers in his village to use biogas and turn his village into an energy and food self-sufficient village.

loans.use: to build a bio-digester facility and utilize bio-slurry (biogas residues) as organic fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase the number of chickens she raises and sells.

loans.name: Isaura

texts.es: Isaura es una mujer soltera de 50 años de edad, no tiene hijos ni pareja, genera ingresos gracias a su negocio de discoteca, trabaja diariamente por mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, poder juntar capital para los arriendos, y su alimento, en el momento se encuentra pagando un computador, que saco para poner música en la discoteca y ahora se le presenta una necesidad de comprar bebidas para abastecer su negocio, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de bebidas alcohólicas y cancelar el saldo del pc, quedando solo con una deuda y pagándola a una entidad de confianza como Interactuar.
texts.en:
Isaura is a 50-year-old, single woman. She does not have children or a spouse. She makes money thanks to her nightclub business. Every day she works to improve the condition of her house, pull together money to cover rent, and pay for her food.

Currently, she is paying for a computer, which she got to play music at the club, and she needs to buy drinks to stock her business. For this reason, she wants to request a loan to purchase alcoholic beverages and pay off the computer, so that she has only one loan and is paying it off through a trustworthy institution like Interactuar.

loans.use: To finish paying for a computer and to purchase alcoholic beverages

loans.name: Steri

texts.en: Steri is a 61-year-old hardworking and still strong married woman with four childrenm most of whom are grownups. Steri sells firewood, which has helped her to pay school fees for her children and construct her commercial house. With this loan, Steri hopes to buy construction materials such as cement and sand to finish her commercial house, which will bring in income for her family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement and sand to finish her commercial house

loans.name: Inacio

texts.pt:
Nasceu na província da Zambézia tem 43 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 2 filhos menores de idade, todos frequentam a escola. Não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Trabalha como segurança a 1 ano onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Dada as dificuldades para terminar  sua obra de residência, solicita o seu 4º empréstimo na Hluvuku para adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, pedra e mais. 
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra de residência e erguer dependências para arrendar.
texts.en:
Inacio comes from the province of Zambézia. He's 43 years old and married. He has two underage children who are in school. He's not responsible for anyone else.
He has worked as a security guard for a year. He spends his earnings on household expenses. Because he's been struggling to finish building his house, he's requesting his 4th loan with Hluvuku so that he can purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement, rocks, etc.
In the future he intends to finish building his house and build rooms for renting out.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, rocks, etc.

loans.name: Ramatou's Group

texts.fr: Ramatou qui se trouve sur la photo à droite s'habillant en noir tenant une daba a la main droite, est membre d’un groupe de 10 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivant et travaillant dans le village de Kimi au sud-est de Bamako au Mali. Ramatou, âgée de 45 ans, est la mère de 5 enfants âgés de 25 à 30 ans, dont 2 d’entre eux sont actuellement scolarisés. L’ancrage de la tradition familiale dans la pratique agricole, source principale de revenu et de l’autosuffisance alimentaire du foyer a incité Ramatou à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 30 ans. Ramatou cultive l'arachide, le riz, l'haricot sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agricultrice à des difficultés telles que le manque de matériels agricoles. Ramatou entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrite en raison du système de paiement et de la perspective de pouvoir augmenter son rendement à travers les services proposés par myAgro. Cette année Ramatou effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.0625 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 20 ans que Ramatou cultive l'arachide pour sa rentabilité productive et marchande. Ramatou planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  de faire de l'élevage et de pouvoir faire du commerce. Enfin Ramatou espère aussi pouvoir assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en:
Ramatou is standing on the left-hand side in the photo, dressed in black and holding a daba (African hoe) in her right hand.  She is a member of a group of 10 farmers registered with myAgro, who live and work in the village of Kimi, located south-east of Bamako, Mali. Ramatou is 45 years old and the mother of five children whose ages range between 25 and 30.  Two of her children currently attend school. 

The family tradition is anchored in agricultural practice, an activity which constitutes the main source of income and provides food self-sufficiency for the family. For this reason, Ramatou decided to become a farmer thirty years ago and she grows groundnut, rice and beans on her plot of land. As a farmer, however, she faces challenges such as the lack of farming tools.  Ramatou is starting her first year with myAgro. She decided to join because of the payment system and because of the prospect of an increased yield through the services offered by myAgro.  This year, she will be making payments to purchase a myAgro package of OPV (open-pollinated variety) seeds and fertilizers to grow groundnut in order to increase her yield on her 0.0625 hectare plot of land.

Ramatou has been growing groundnut for 20 years now for its profitability and its commercial value.  With her expected increased yield and income, she is planning to start raising livestock and to expand her activity into the retail business. She also hopes to be able to ensure food self-sufficiency for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a package of OPV seeds and fertilizers, in order to grow groundnut.

loans.name: Igancio De Jesus

texts.es:
Ignacio es una trabajador humilde, comprometido y responsable que tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y frutas y legumbres, el negocio lo empezó hace poco más de un año, pues quería ser emprendedor, ser su propio jefe, este hombre se esfuerza demasiado, abre todos los días desde tempranas horas, hasta altas horas de la noche, es separado de su esposa pero tuvo 3 hijos con ella, a los cuales les manda dinero para que compren mercado, y compren sus implementos de aseo personal y estudien.
 El sueño de Ignacio con el negocio fue el de mejorar sus condiciones de vivienda, en el momento no ha podido, pues se está adaptando al negocio t recuperando el dinero que invirtió en el montaje de este.
Ignacio quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido, el cual pagara con las ganancias que está dejando su negocio, invertirá la mitad del dinero en productos como víveres y abarrotes y el resto en frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
Ignacio is a humble worker, committed and responsible, who has a little business of selling groceries, fruits, and vegetables. He began the business a little more than a year ago, since he wanted to be an entrepreneur and to be his own boss. This man exerts himself excessively. The store is open every day from the early hours until late at night. He is separated from his wife, but he had three children with her, and he sends them money so that they can buy things, purchase their personal grooming products, and go to school.

Ignacio's dream for his business is to improve the conditions of his house. Up to the moment he has not been able to, since he is adjusting to the business and recovering the money that he invested in setting it up.

Ignacio wants to apply for a loan for the purchase of stock, which he will pay off with the earnings that his business yields. He will invest half of the money in products such as supplies and groceries and the rest in fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy a stock of groceries, supplies, fruits, and vegetables.

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es:
Nada es para siempre y esto lo tiene muy claro el Señor Rafael un hombre nacido y forjado en el campo el cual se dedica a la producción de leche, está pasando por un momento difícil y fue la muerte de 5 de sus vacas pro edad, algo que lo tiene muy afectado, y más su negocio pues todo el capital que produce es gracias a la venta de leche.
Rafael un hombre de 60 años de edad, que es separado y tiene 5 hijos hoy pide tu ayuda para comprar 5 vacas y seguir desarrollando su actividad.
texts.en:
Nothing lasts forever and this is very clear to Rafael. He is a man who was born and raised in the country. He works in milk production. He is going through a difficult time due to the death of 5 of his cows from old age. This has really affected him and it has affected his business even more. All of the capital he produces is thanks to the milk sales. 

Rafael is a 60 year old man. He is separated and has 5 children. Today he is asking for your help to buy 5 cows so he can continue with his activity.

loans.use: to buy cows. He has an emergency because his cows died and he urgently needs to buy 5.

loans.name: Joao

texts.pt:
Nasceu na província de Manica tem 54 anos de idade, casado oficialmente pai de 5 filhos maiores de idade, todos frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pelos seus 4 netos que vivem em sua casa.
É sub-espector a mais de 18 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Solicita o empréstimo para aumentar o volume da sua produção adquirindo insumos agrícolas como: adubos, sementes e preparacao de viveiros. Este é o seu 6º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende ampliar a sua machamba, aumentar o número dos trabalhadores e adquirir um tractor para sua machamba.
texts.en:
Joao comes from the province of Manica. He's 54 years old and married. He has five adult children, all of whom are in school. He's responsible for his four grandchildren who live with him.
He has been a sub-inspector for over 18 years. He spends his earnings on household expenses. He's requesting the loan so that he can increase production by purchasing farm supplies such as compost and seeds, and setting up a nursery. This is his 6th loan with Hluvuku.
In the future he intends to expand his farm, increase his number of employees and buy a tractor for his farm.

loans.use: to purchase compost and seeds, and to set up a nursery.

loans.name: Omar De Jesus

texts.es:
Omar, está acompañado, vive con su pareja e hijos, es la única persona que trabaja para poder cubrir los gastos familiares, tiene un negocio desde hace 10 años que es cultivar granos básicos y atender una ganadería, no representa dificultades al desarrollar dicha actividad.
Invertirá en abono, semilla, insecticidas para dar un buen trato a sus cultivos de granos básicos, también comprara ganado a bajo precio para cuidarlo y venderlo robusto a un mejor precio, espera que su negocio prospere y le genere mejores ingresos para seguir apoyando a su familia.
Omar tiene como sueños reducir lo más que se pueda las necesidades de su familia y que sus hijos sean personas profesionales que ayuden a tener una mejor sociedad.
texts.en:
Omar is married. He lives with his spouse and children. He is the only person who works to cover the household expenses. He has had a business for 10 years, which is growing basic grains and raising cattle. He has no difficulties with this activity. 

He will invest in fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides to treat his basic grain crops. He will also buy cattle at a low price to care for it and sell when it's grown at a better price. He hopes that his business will prosper and generate better income so that he can continue to support his family. 

Omar's dream is yo reduce his family needs as much as possible and for his children to graduate from college and help form a better society.

loans.use: to invest in fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides to treat his basic grain crops. He will also buy cattle at a low price to care for it.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more cocoa as a supplement  to her harvests to sell.

loans.name: José Vicente

texts.es:
José es un padre de 55 años de edad, tiene tres hijos y se dedica a atender un negocio de venta de dulces, cigarrillos, frituras de papas en bolsa y a ofertar servicios de minuto de celular lleva ejerciendo está actividad desde el año 2000, pero ahora quiere dar un paso y tener un local constituido donde puede tener un mayor surtido y por ende mejorar sus ventas.
José quiere solicitar un préstamo para un local comercial y para duplicar su surtido, quiere ofrecer una mejor estabilidad a su familia, que sus hijos estudien y vivan una vida digna bajo su manto.
texts.en:
José is a 55-year-old father who has 3 children.  He makes a living working in a business selling sweets, cigarettes, bagged potato chips and offering cell phone minute services.  He has been working in this business since the year 2000 but now he wants to take the next step and have an established store where he can have a greater selection and therefore improve his sales. 

José wants to request a loan for a store and to double his selection.  He wants to provide greater stability to his family and he wants his children to study and live a dignified life under his care.

loans.use: to have a store, to double his selection and provide better stability to his family.

loans.name: Gloria Amparo

texts.es: Gloria es una mujer soltera de 49 años de edad que vela por su bienestar y el de su padres, ella trabaja vendiendo alimentos, todo su conocimiento es empírico, fabrica el producto mas consumido en el desayuno de los habitantes de la región antioqueña que es la arepa, como es una persona humilde, tiene un molino manual y de verdad es muy demorado y desgastante realizar el proceso de triturado de maíz con este objeto y como ella es sola porque no puede pagar un empleado fabrica una cantidad baja de arepas pues humanamente no puede realizar más arepas, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de un molino eléctrico que facilitare en grandes proporciones su trabajo, comprara otro asador pues podrá producir más e insumos principalmente maíz
texts.en:
Gloria is a single, 49-year-old woman who looks out for her and her parents' wellbeing. She works selling food, and all of her knowledge is from practical experience. She makes arepas, the product most widely eaten at breakfast by inhabitants of the Antioqueña region.

As a humble person, she has a manual corn mill, and to be honest, it is very time-consuming and exhausting to use it to grind corn. Because she is alone, not able to pay an employee, she makes only a small amount of arepas and it is not humanly possible to make more.

For this reason, she wants to request a loan to purchase an electric corn mill, which will greatly facilitate her work. She will buy another grill which will let her produce more, as well as ingredients, mainly corn.

loans.use: To buy an electric corn mill, a grill, and corn

loans.name: Jeniffer

texts.es:
Jeniffer es una mujer soltera y cabeza de familia de 27 años de edad dedicada a la confección a terceros una actividad con la que ha logrado levantar y mejorar las condiciones de su familia conformada por dos hijos menores de edad, ella siempre ha querido mejorar su producción y los tiempos de confección en cada prenda, generar empleo y consolidar un grupo de trabajo con el cual quiere conseguir un gran sueño que es tener una casa propia.
Jeniffer busca un apoyo financiera para la compra de una maquina fileteadora y una maquina plana, contratara una persona y mejorara los tiempos de producción, atenderá pedidos más grandes y su utilidad de subira considerablemente.
texts.en: Jeniffer is a 27 year old single woman and head of family. She works sewing for third parties a business that she managed to establish and improve the living conditions of her family which consists of her two minor daughters. She has always wanted to improve her production and the time taken to make each piece, generate employment and consolidate a work group with whom she can achieve her biggest dream, which is to own a house. Jeniffer is looking for financial help to buy a flatbed sewing machine and a serger and hire a person. She will improve her production times, be able to fill larger orders and her profits will rise considerably.

loans.use: to buy a flatbed sewing machine and a serger.

loans.name: Silverio Antonio

texts.es:
Silverio es un hombre humilde, amoroso, responsable que se dedica a la fabricación de muebles en plástico, esta actividad es el sustento para una familia conformada por él, su esposa y 8 hijos, una amplia familia que por su gran numero a veces no le alcanza para comprar el surtido para su empresa, por la responsabilidad e alimentar primero a su familia.
Silverio necesita plástico para seguir desarrollando su actividad pro ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar cantidades de este producto, su único deseo es que su familia tenga una buena calidad de vida y sea feliz.
texts.en:
Silverio is a humble, loving, responsible man who makes plastic furniture. With this money he supports his family, made up of him, his wife and his 8 children. It is a large family and due to it's large number sometimes he doesn't have enough to buy inventory for his business, because his first responsibility is to feed his family. 

Silverio needs plastic to continue carrying out his activity. Because of this, he wants to ask for a loan to buy some of this product. His only wish is for his family to have a good quality of life and be happy.

loans.use: to buy plastic to make furniture. He supports a family of 8 children.

loans.name: Good Wishes Young Mothers Group

texts.en:
The lady on the left hand-side is Peris, forty five years old, married and a mother of two children who attend school.
Peris joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in year 2014. She has benefited from trainings especially in saving and enterprise management where she acquired skills on better saving methods and enterprise development. She is able to run her poultry enterprise well.

She is borrowing from Kiva to add more chicks to her enterprise in order to earn more income, thus enabling her to uplift her living standards such as quality education for her children.

She is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the financial assistance and promises to repay back promptly.

loans.use: To buy more chicks that will increase income thus provide family needs with ease.

loans.name: Kaburugi Mugecha Self Help Group

texts.en:
The person raising her hand in the photo is Ann; thirty one years old and a mother of one child. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in year 2014 to benefit from enterprise and financial management training that has enabled her run the business well.

She does vegetable farming and wants to expand it. This makes her apply for a loan  to buy fertilizer in order to increase her production .She hopes for improved living standards and be able to pay school fees for her child.
Ann is grateful to Kiva and their lenders.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer in order to improve crop yield thus more income from improved farming.

loans.name: Lucas

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha província de Maputo tem 35 anos de idade, vive maritalmente, pai de 1 filho menor de idade, responsabiliza-se pelos seus pais e sua irmã.
É funcionário do Estado  a mais de 10 anos como Policia onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Pois com o fundo próprio não conseguia erguer a sua obra, já trabalhando com a Hluvuku consegui superar parte das suas dificuldades. Para dar continuidade a sua obra de residência solícita o seu 4º empréstimo para dar continuidade com a mesma adquirindo material de construção como: areia, cimento, varões e pedra.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra, contrair matrimónio e garantir o ensino do seu filho até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Lucas comes from Namaacha, province of Maputo. He's 35 years old and married. He has an underage son and he's responsible for his parents and his sister.
He has been a government employee for over 10 years. He works as a police officer and spends his earnings on household expenses. Because he couldn't afford the construction work on his own, he's been working with Hluvuku and has managed to overcome part of his struggles. In order to continue building his house he requests his 4th loan so that he can move it forward by purchasing construction supplies such as sand, cement, rods and rocks.
In the future he intends to finish the construction work, get married and provide his son with an education until he graduates from college.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, rods and rocks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer for use in her farm and hopes this will enable her to get more farm produce to sell.

loans.name: Yokonia

texts.en: Yokonia is a married man charged with the responsibility of taking care of three children, living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He operates a retail shop of general merchandise plus does cocoa farming and selling as a source of additional income. Because of the need to take good care of his family, Yokonia is engaged in the business which has supported him to start on his projects like constructing his family house. He intends to use the loan to buy building materials like doors and windows and pay labor for the builders.

loans.use: to buy building materials like doors and windows and pay labor for the builders.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius used the previous loan to buy more chicks for his poultry farm. He has a business of frying chicken on a busy centre and at the same time rears poultry. He is faced with challenges of low capital, that hinder progress in his business. However, he has a vision of having a fully furnished house. He has asked for a loan to buy cement, sand, bricks and pay labor.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks and pay labor.

loans.name: Samwel

texts.en:
Samwel 38 years old is married to Yucabeth and he supports 5 family members. 

He has been in a motorcycle transport service for the last 14 years earning an income of KES 10,000 per month. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya so as to purchase motorcycle spare parts for repair and maintenance so as to meet client needs in transport services. 

He plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate his children. 

His hope is to be financially stable.

loans.use: To purchase motorcycle spare parts for repair and maintenance so as to meet client needs in transport services.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa for selling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cattle for selling in order to have a good monthly income

loans.name: Monday  Wilson

texts.en: Wilson deals in cocoa farming and selling which is supplemented by banana growing for income generation. He started his business in 2000 to raise income to support the family’s increasing demands. His desire is to complete his family house, hence he is requesting a loan to buy building materials like iron sheets, roofing timber, cement, and doors. Wilson’s business is affected by unpredictable changes in weather and high labor costs hindering his returns.

loans.use: to buy building materials for his house, including iron sheets, roofing timber, cement and doors.

loans.name: Rosa Melida

texts.es:
Rosa, se dedica a vender productos de la canasta básica, vive con su compañero de vida y cuatro hijos, no tiene ayuda económica del extranjero, inicio su negocio hace 7 años y lo hizo por necesidad de mejorar las condiciones de vida familiar, con el paso del tiempo su inventario ha mejorado y de igual manera sus clientes han aumentado.
Con el préstamo comprará 30 sacos de maíz, ya que es un producto que tiene alta demanda, espera que las ventas incrementen y pueda aumentar las ganancias para subsistir con su familia.
Rosa añora que su negocio tenga un inventario más competitivo, cancelar la deuda y trabajar con capital propio.
texts.en: Rosa works selling basic food items. She lives with her life companion and four children. She has no help from abroad. She started her business 7 years ago and did it out of the need to improve the family's living conditions. With the passing of time her inventory has increased as well as her number of clients. She will buy 30 sacks of corn with the loan as it is a product in high demand. She will wait until sales increase and she can increase the profit for the sustenance of her family. Rosa longs for her business to have a more competitive inventory, pay off her debt and work with her own capital.

loans.use: will buy 30 sacks of corn as it is a product in high demand and wait for her sales to increase to increase her profit.

loans.name: Kitheuni Shg Group

texts.en:
The lady with her hand up is Ziporah, thirty seven years of age, married and blessed with five children who are in primary school. She is a member of Kitheuni SHG group that joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in year 2014. The group members have undergone training on Group formation, Saving and Resource mobilization, Enterprise Development, Financial Management, Focus on Environment and Value Addition & Market Linkage. 

Ziporah does capsicum and tomato farming as her main economic activity. She is borrowing to buy seedlings and pesticides to increase yield that will enable her get more income. She will use part of the anticipated income to pay school fees for her children.
She is happy for Kiva and their lenders and promises to pay promptly.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer that will boost farming thus more income to meet family needs.

loans.name: Margarita Maria

texts.es:
Margarita es una ama de casa cabeza de familia de 36 años de edad, madre de dos hijos que está tratando de sacar a flote su negocio de venta de mercancía donde principalmente distribuye pantalones, pues tiene un sueño de comprar una vivienda propia, sus esfuerzos no son bien recompensados pues con lo que vende solo el alcanza para pagar sus necesidad básicas en su hogar, pero esto debido en gran parte a la falta de capital para comprar mercancía y vende lo que puede surtir.
Margarita quiere solicitar un préstamo para ampliar su inventario, este esfuerzo será muy importante para ella pues tendrá la oportunidad de aumentar sus ganancias en un 25%, apóyala, ella quiere crecer a pasos cortos pero seguros.
Margarita al no tener una persona en quien refugiarse acude al crédito, esta mujer es cabeza de familia y un apoyo tuyo será muy significativo para está mujer que todos los días trabaja en las calles para alimentar a su familia.
texts.en:
Margarita is a 36-year-old housewife, who is the head of her family. She is the mother of two children and is trying to keep her business afloat. She sells merchandise, mainly pants. She dreams of buying her own house, but her efforts do not bring her a good return because with what she sells, she only manages to cover household expenses. But this is due in grand part to a lack of capital to buy merchandise, and she sells what she can get in stock.

Margarita wants to request a loan to expand her inventory. This effort will be very important for her because she will have the opportunity to increase her sales by 25%. Support her. She wants to grow via small but steady steps.

Not having another person to rely on, Margarita is requesting the loan. This woman is the head of her family, and your support will be very significant to this woman, who works in the streets every day to feed her family.

loans.use: To purchase men's and women's pants

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
The person in the photo is Mary, thirty nine years old and a mother of four children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2014 to benefit through Enterprise Development and Financial Management training.

She is borrowing a loan to add more stock of vegetables and fruits to her greengrocer store. She looks forward to a rise in sales that will enable her get more income. She anticipates using the income in catering for family needs.
Mary is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for their support.

loans.use: To buy more stock of vegetables and fruits for her greengrocer store that will increase income.

loans.name: Camila

texts.es:
Camila es una madre soltera cabeza de familia, tiene dos hijos y se dedica a la confección de línea propia, en las fotos se puede ver algunos de sus trabajos, lleva operando desde el año 1997.
Camila le está enseñando a sus hijos del negocio quiere que ellos en algún momento tomen las riendas de su negocio y juntos trabajar para comprar una casa propia que es su gran sueño.
En el momento se está pasando por meses difíciles, las ventas no han sido buenas pero ella sigue en pie.
Camila quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de telas para sacar una nueva colección preparándose para surtir almacenes que se están preparando para  afrontar un gran evento que es la feria de flores y navidad que es la temporada donde se compra más ropa en Antioquia
texts.en:
Camila is a single mother and the head of a family. She has two children, and she makes her own line of clothing. Some of her work can be seen in the photo. She has been in business since the year 1997.

Camila is instructing her children in the business. At some time she wants them to take control of her business and work together to buy their own house, which is her great dream.

At this time she is passing through some difficult months. Sales have not been good, but she continues to go on.

Camila wants to apply for a loan to purchase fabrics to bring out a new collection, preparing herself to stock warehouses that are preparing to face big events, the Flower Fair and Christmas, which are the seasons when the most clothing is purchased in Antioquia.

loans.use: to buy the fabric to develop a new line of her own clothing.

loans.name: Sipho

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Krugersdorpse província do mesmo nome, tem 29 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 3 filhos menores de idade, apenas 1 frequenta a escola, responsabiliza-se pelos seus sobrinhos que vivem em sua casa.
 É policia a mais de 10 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Pois enfrentando dificuldades para dar continuidade a sua obra solicita o seu 1º empréstimo na Hluvuku para adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, varões e pedra. 
Futuramente pretende abrir uma agência de despachante aduaneiro e adquirir um aparelho de som completo para discoteca.
texts.en:
Sipho comes from Krugersdorpse, in the province of the same name. He's 29 years old and married. He has three underage children, only one of whom is in school. He's responsible for his nephews who live with him.
He has been a police officer for over 10 years and spends his earnings on household expenses. Because he has been struggling to continue his construction work, he's requesting his first loan with Hluvuku so that he can purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement, rods and rocks.
In the future he intends to open a customs clearance agency and acquire a complete sound system for dance clubs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, rods and rocks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, iron bars, and pay labor for the builders.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, se dedica a cultivar granos básicos, a la crianza de cerdos y ganado, desde muy pequeño sus padres le inculcaron el oficio, tiene más de 20 años de trabajar de manera independiente, desarrolla sus actividades en un horario de siete de la mañana a tres de la tarde, no cuenta con otros ingresos; su núcleo familiar está integrada por su compañera de vida y cuatro hijos.
Por el momento no cuenta con los recursos económicos para adquirir los insumos agrícolas que necesita para realizar la siembra de esta temporada, requiere de un crédito para comprar abono, herbicidas, semilla y también cancelara los gastos que se generan al preparar el terreno para sembrar granos básicos, espera que aumentar la productividad de su negocio y como riesgo es el robo de la cosecha.
Los sueños de María son lograr tener cosechas abundantes y sin plagas para generar más ganancias y cancelar la deuda con buena calificación agrícola.
texts.en:
María has worked growing basic grains and raising pigs and cattle since she was very young. Her parents taught her the business. She has been working independently for more than 20 years. She works a schedule from seven in the morning until three in the afternoon. She has no other income. Her family is made up of her life companion and four children.

At this time she does not have the economic resources she needs to plant this season. She needs a loan to buy manure, herbicides, seeds and also pay for the expenses of preparing the land for planting basic grains. She hopes to increase the production of her business as risk is what steals a harvest.

María's dream is to manage to have abundant harvests with no infestations to generate more profit and pay off her loan with good agricultural standing.

loans.use: to buy manure, herbicides, seeds and also pay for the expenses of preparing the land for planting basic grains.

loans.name: Edras Isai

texts.es:
Edras, con el préstamo anterior ha mantenido la venta de ropa y la tienda surtida con productos que sus clientes demandan, sus ingresos no han variado mucho pero le son de ayuda para cubrir las necesidades de su familia y para comprar algunos electrodomésticos, además ha fortalecido la venta de pan en otro puesto de venta.
En esta ocasión el crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de variedad de pan para revender y atender mejor a sus clientes, espera abastecer su negocio con pan fresco cada vez que lo necesite.
texts.en:
With the previous loan, Edras has maintained his clothing sales and kept the store stocked with products that his customers demand. His income has not changed much, but it is helping him to cover the needs of his family and to buy some domestic appliances. In addition, he has strengthened the sale of bread at another market stall.

At this time he will invest the loan that he is applying for in the purchase of a variety of bread to resell and better serve his customers. He hopes to stock his business with fresh bread every time he needs it.

loans.use: to buy a variety of bread to sell and better serve his customers.

loans.name: Omaira

texts.es:
Omaira es una mujer de 29 años de edad, ella vive en la zona rural y trabaja con niños, tiene una guardería y un enorme reto de insertar en las mentes de los niños el deseo y la motivación de superación que entienda que tienen grandes capacidades y pueden salir adelante, ayudar a sus familiares del campo, eso lo trata de desarrollar todos los días con juegos didácticos, con talleres de preparación haciéndoles saber a sus niños que son muy inteligentes,
Omaira conforme va teniendo presupuesto va remodelando su guardería quiere crear un lugar y un ambiente con todos las herramientas  necesarias para dar una buena educación.
Ella es una empresaria humilde, cobra lo básico, les da alimento y educación a los niños y ahora quiere solicitar un préstamo para remodelar la guardería, construir una zona de juegos, pintarla, poner cercas de seguridad, columpios y deslizaderos, pues tiene un sueño de ser la mejor guardería de la zona, apóyala, préstale Omaira te necesita.
texts.en:
Omaira is a 29-year-old woman, who lives in a rural area and works with children. She has a daycare and a grand goal of imparting to the children the desire and motivation to improve themselves. She wants them to understand that they have great abilities and can succeed in life and help their family members in the countryside. This involves daily development through learning games and educational workshops to make sure the children know that they are very intelligent.

Omaira has a budget and is remodeling her daycare, wanting to create a location and environment with all the equipment needed to provide a good education.

She is a humble businesswoman and charges reasonable rates. She feeds and educates the children, and now she wants to request a loan to remodel the daycare, build a play area, paint it, and put up security fences, swings, and slides. She dreams of being the best daycare in the area. Support her, make this loan to her, Omaira needs you.

loans.use: To remodel the daycare, build a play area, paint it, and put up security fences, swings, and slides. She dreams of being the best area daycare.

loans.name: Jaimes

texts.es:
Jaimes es un hombre dedicado, trabajador de 56 años de edad que se dedica a al venta ambulante de comida, Jaimes vende pizza, este negocio ha servido para el sostenimiento y mejoramiento de la calidad de vida de su familia, adquirió toda la experiencia necesaria trabajando en pizzería y se salió del negocio por querer buscar ganar mejores ingresos ya que con el salario que ganaba anteriormente apenas si el alcanzaba para sus necesidades más básicas.
Es padre de dos hijos son todo para él y se empeña pro superarse y darles una excelente vida.
Jaimes poco a poco ha ido adquiriendo clientela, vende lo que produce y ahora quiere ir por más, por ello busca un apoyo financiero para la compra de piña, harina margarina, jamón, queso, refrescos para triplicar su producción y tener buena existencia de materia prima para fabricar sus ya famosas pizzas hawaianas.
Su deseo es poder comprar una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Jaimes is a hard-working and dedicated 56-year-old man. He is a food stall vendor selling pizza. This business has served to support and improve his family’s quality of life. He gained all the necessary experience by working in a pizzeria and left the business because he wanted to earn more since what he had been earning barely met their basic needs.

He is the father of two children who are everything to him, and he insists on succeeding and giving them an excellent life.

Jaimes has been gaining customers little by little. He sells what he makes and now he wants to try for more. He is seeking financial assistance to buy pineapple, flour, margarine, ham, cheese and soft drinks to triple his production and have a good supply of raw materials to make his already famous Hawaiian pizzas.

His dream is to be able to buy his own home.

loans.use: to buy pineapple, flour, margarine, ham, cheese and soft drinks to triple his production and have a good supply of raw materials to make his already famous Hawaiian pizzas.

loans.name: Lucky Time Group

texts.en:
The person raising her hand in the photograph is Ann, 31 years old and a member of Lucky Time Group. She joined the group in the year 2014 where she has benefited from Hand in Hand Eastern Africa training on enterprise and financial management.

She runs both a retail shop and a grocery store selling vegetables to earn a living. She is borrowing from Kiva to add more stock of vegetables in her grocery. This will attract more customers and increase in sales, thus more profits to meet family needs such as school fees.
Ann is grateful to Kiva and their lenders and promises to pay back the loan promptly.

loans.use: to buy stock of vegetables that will boost sales, thus increase income to cater for family needs such as school fees.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
The person in this photo is Margaret, 57 years old, married and the mother of seven children. She has been a member of Hand in Hand Eastern Africa since 2014 and has successfully undergone the enterprise development training.

Margaret is a mixed farmer who does dairy farming, poultry keeping and maize, bean, and mango farming and she is borrowing from Kiva to enable her to buy seeds and fertilizer for her farm. This will enable her to boost farming and thus get more income to cater for family needs.

She is grateful to Kiva and its lenders and promises to pay promptly.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer that will improve income, thus catering for family needs with ease.

loans.name: Juliah

texts.en:
Juliah is 45 years old and supports 4 family members.

She has been practicing small scale farming for the last 10 years earning an income of KES 15,000 per month.

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children.

Her hope is to lead a financially stable life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting

loans.name: William

texts.en: William has been a teacher since 1984; he practices farming and also owns a small retail shop of general merchandise which he began with his little savings. He hopes to build a beautiful house and have very learned children. William will use this loan to buy cement, sand, and pay for labour for his family house construction.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and pay for labour for his family house construction.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a solar solution for her business to increase her income

loans.name: Githaiti Gutera Group

texts.en:
The person raising his hand in the photo is John, 52 years old, married and a father of five children. He is a member of Githaiti Gutera Group that joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa (HIH EA) in the year 2014.

He has benefited through HIH EA training, especially on ways of improving his savings and also managing his enterprise. 

John does dairy farming and is borrowing a Kiva loan to buy animal feed that will increase his milk production. This will enable him to improve his living standards and that of his family by providing better medical care and a quality education.

John is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for the assistance and promises to repay back promptly.

loans.use: To buy animal feed that will help boost dairy farming thus improve productivity.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts for repairs and maintenance of his motorcycle, to offer better transportation services to clients.

loans.name: Dany Felipe

texts.es: Dany Felipe,  tiene la edad  de 23 años, está soltero,  vive con sus hermanos y sus padres, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de unas plantas de almácigo de café y de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra para realizar trabajos de conservación de suelo para evitar la erosión del suelo por el agua llovida en la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo del cultivo del café. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Dany Felipe is 23 years old. He is single and lives with his siblings and his parents, who are his greatest priority. With his loan, he plans to make the purchase of some coffee seedlings, fertilizers, and other products to apply to the planting. In addition, he will pay for labor to do the soil conservation work to avoid soil erosion because of the rainwater,  make the application of the products, and help in the planting, and in this way, he will be sure of doing good work. What he plans is to take advantage of the good climate and soil conditions of the area for this crop and also to put into practice the experience of a number of years of managing the cultivation of coffee. In addition, he wants to be able to buy the best products of the best quality so that his plantation has good development and sanitation as well as a sufficient harvest and in the near term to have a substantial production.

He wants to use the income that he hopes to obtain from the harvest for the well-being and education of his family and to accomplish some family goals and continue investing more in the crops. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant coffee and pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients like two bags of rice, five bags of charcoal, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Suzan

texts.en:
Suzan is a 22-year-old, single lady who started working two years ago as an accountant in a company to cover her needs and expenses. She is still studying too, for she believes that dreams can only be achieved with a university certificate. 

Suzan is an ambitious lady who has a lot of dreams for the future. Thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to pay her university tuition fees.  Suzan hopes to finish her studies and start a business on her own, to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition fees.

loans.name: Everine

texts.en:
Everine, who lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda, is a mother of six children and a hardworking woman dealing in cocoa buying and selling. She got involved in the businesses to earn income and meet increasing family demands. 

She has a cocoa garden where she gets additional income. She is challenged by bad weather and limited capital that hinders expansion of her cocoa business.  

Everine has asked for a loan to buy more cocoa seeds for drying and selling to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa seeds for drying and to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Marisol Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marisol, vende ropa para adultos y niños/as, sumado a ello elabora tamales para salir a vender, tiene mucha experiencia en realizar dichas actividades, en su lo calidad es muy reconocida por el tipo de negocio que posee; vive con su familia, ella decidió trabajar para que su esposo no tuviera solo la responsabilidad del hogar.
Comprará vestidos, pantalones, chores, faldas, camisas, etc., renovara el inventario de su negocio para ofrecer ofertas más atractivas a sus clientes, también invertirá un porcentaje del crédito en maíz, carnes, verduras, condimentos y aceite para elaborar la venta de tamales, su objetivo es satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y generar más ingresos.
Marisol se esfuerza por mantener su negocio estable para cubrir sus compromisos y asegurarles a sus hijos el acceso a educación superior de calidad.
texts.en:
Marisol sells clothing for adults and children. In addition, she makes tamales to go out and sell. She has a lot of experience in both areas, and she is well known in her community for the kind of business she has. She lives with her family, and decided to work so that her husband wouldn't be solely responsible for the home.

She will buy dresses, pants, shorts, skirts, shirts, etc. to  restock her inventory so she can offer her clients more attractive purchases. She will also invest a percentage of the loan in corn, meat, vegetables, condiments and oil to make tamales to sell. Her objective is to fulfill her clients' needs and to increase her income. Marisol works hard to keep her business stable, to fulfill her commitments and to assure her children access to quality higher education.

loans.use: to buy dresses, pants, shorts, skirts, shirts, etc. She will restock her inventory so she can offer her clients more attractive purchases

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal for her business

loans.name: Kiran

texts.en:
Kiran, age 48, lives in the district of Alipurduar in West Bengal with her husband Bikash and their three sons. One is pursuing his Master's degree and the other two are engaged in some small business. Kiran is illiterate; she can only sign her name. She did not get an elementary education due to her parents’ poor financial resources. Her husband studied up to grade nine.

Kiran's husband is an ex-serviceman and now he is engaged in a small business of manufacturing and selling different types of bags like school bags, office bags, ladies bags, purses, wallets, travel bags, etc. from leather and foam. Kiran also helps him in this business. They sell these bags in the locality and to her neighbors and also supply the local shops.  

Kiran has applied for a loan from BJS to purchase the necessary items such as leather and other tools to expand their business. She aspires to grow the business for her family's secured future.

She thanks her lenders (BJS and Kiva) for funding the loan.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials for her husband's bag manufacturing business.

loans.name: Mamani

texts.en:
Mamani is a 38-year-old rural woman. She lives with her husband and two children in Falakata. She and her husband both are illiterate and can only sign their name. Their children are studying in different grades now.

Mamani's husband is a fish vender. Mamani sells betel nuts to give her family additional support. Betel nut is a kind of mouth freshener that is used by the local people. She knows that the villagers are fond of betel leaves (taken with betel nuts) after their laborious work. So, there is a huge demand for betel nuts in her locality. As they have no betel nut trees, she has to purchase raw betel nuts from the wholesale market and after removing the shells, cut the sun dried betel nuts into small pieces to sell in the local market shops and nearby pan stalls.

Mamani is a hardworking entrepreneur who is always concerned with her family’s well-being. So, to increase the family livelihood, Mamani is seeking a loan from BJS, a Kiva partner to purchase raw betel nuts in bulk for sale. 

Her dream is to enhance the business and obtain a greater income that will enable her family to get ahead and provide a better opportunity in life for her family. It will enable her to earn a profit to a large extent. 

Mamani is thankful to her lenders.

loans.use: To purchase raw betel nuts in bulk for her existing business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase spare parts and do quality service and maintenance for the motorbike, for more income to improve family living standards.

loans.name: Malati

texts.en:
Malati is a resident of Alipurduar, West Bengal. She is a married woman of 43 years. Her husband Parimal is a mason by profession. Malati has a small family consisting of her husband and one son. Her son is a student in grade 12 at a local school.

Malati is managing a business stitching garments from her house. As she has a sound knowledge of stitching, she has chosen this business. She hopes she can earn sufficiently from this business, because there is a good demand for her product. She sews garments like shirts, trousers, frocks, blouses, and petticoats for her customers per their orders. Now she wants a loan to purchase a better and improved sewing machine for better stitching.

So she applied for a loan from Kiva through BJS for expansion of her existing business. With the profit, she hopes to give a good education to her only son and secure her family’s future.

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine for her sewing business.

loans.name: Lali

texts.en:
Lali is a 34-year-old rural housewife. She lives in the village named Babupara in the Alipurduar district of West Bengal with her husband and two children (a son and a daughter). Both of her children are students. Lali has attended school up to grade 8 and was deprived of further education due to  financial issues in her family.

Her husband Raju has been associated with clothing sales for years. He purchases clothing like saris, frocks, salwar suits and many other items from the wholesale dealers and sells in the local town market. According to the festivals and occasions, he sells his products per the customers’ demands. Lali helps her husband in selling sari mainly (a traditional Indian dress for women).  The local rural people, neighbors, relatives and friends are also their valuable customers. Together, the couple has been working hard to earn a livelihood since this is their sole source of income. They earn barely enough to cover all the household expenses. To achieve more stock in their collection, the couple needs capital to buy a variety of good quality clothing. For this reason, Lali has applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner).

She hopes the loan amount will help her to buy more variety of clothing to sell and will take care of her financial expenses for the rest of the year. Her main desire is to expand the business with a resulting profit.

Lali is thanking her lenders.

loans.use: To increase the stock of clothing for her family's business.

loans.name: Zvart

texts.en:
Zvart is 59 years old and she lives in Agarak village of Lori region. She has a higher pedagogical education. Now she is the deputy director of the school where for many years she worked as a teacher of mathematics, thanks to her devotion to her work and specialty, which she considers a very responsible and serious one. She also has group of pupils whom she gives paid private courses of mathematics at her house, preparing them for the entrance exams. She also helps some pupils who have hardships in their teaching process. She characterizes herself as a strict, patient pedagogue. 

Zvart is married and she has a son and a daughter. Her husband is busy with farming and agriculture. With this loan amount that Zvart asks for, she wants to buy a computer and professional literature for her courses at home, and for her pedagogical activities as well.

loans.use: to buy a computer and professional literature for her courses at home, and for her pedagogical activities as well.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en: Anahit is a teacher with 40 years of experience. She graduated from the faculty of physics at the State Pedagogical University. For many years she has been a physics teacher at the same school where she started when she was very young. Her students love and respect her very much. She also tutors some students at her house to prepare them for the physics entrance exams. Anahit lives with her husband in the city of Stepanavan in the Lori region of Armenia. They have two daughters, who are married. Anahit asks for a loan of 300,000 Armenian drams to buy some professional literature and a computer for the teaching activities she does with her students at home.

loans.use: to buy some professional literature and a computer for teaching activities.

loans.name: Belkisu

texts.en: Belkisu is single and 35 years old with no dependents. She has been in the business for five years. Her business is located near a school with a lot of passersby.The students and the passersby are mainly those who purchase the water. She wants to be able to own a restaurant in five years with the sachet water business attached to it. This is the first time she is accessing a loan.

loans.use: To expand her sachet water business.

loans.name: Albino

texts.pt: O Senhor Albino vive numa casa própria com a esposa e 4 filhos.  É militar, com o presente empréstimo vai adiquirir materiais de contrução tais como cimento, areia, ferros, pedra para sua obra na casa onde reside. Tem sonho de ter uma casa melhorada e bem mobilada. Tem como maior desafio trabalhar para conseguir dar conforto a sua familia.
texts.en: Albino lives with his wife and four children in a house that he owns. He's a serviceman. With the current loan he'll purchase construction supplies such as cement, sand, iron and rocks to do construction work on his house. His dream is to have an improved, furnished home. His biggest challenge is working towards providing comfort for his family.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, iron and rocks to do construction work on his house.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Zainab is a 61-year-old widowed mother of six children. Ten years ago she started selling clothes to cover her children's needs and expenses. She is an ambitious lady and a sacrificing mother who has a good reputation among her region.

Today, Zainab is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to develop her business and increase her merchandise with new collection of summer clothes. This loan will help Zainab satisfy her customers' needs and attract new ones. 

Zainab hopes to expand her business more in the future to stay capable of providing her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with a new collection of summer clothes

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna is 61 years old and she lives with her husband and son in Stepanavan city of Lori region. Susanna has a specialty of pedagogue and she has worked in this field over 30 years as a (teacher of Armenian language and literature). 

Now she enjoys her agricultural activities and takes care of her orchard. Here she has harvest of strawberries, mulberries, apples and apricots. She also has vegetable garden, where she cultivates tomatoes, cucumbers, beans and greens. She sells all of these harvests to her neighbors, and also to the markets in Stapanavan city. She asks for this loan, as she has new plans connected with farming and she hopes it will be profitable for her family. With this loan amount she wants to build a barn near her house and she will start swine breeding in her farm as well.

loans.use: to build a barn near her house and she will start swine breeding in her farm as well.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.pt:
Nasceu na província de Maputo tem 32 anos de idade, casada oficialmente, mãe de 3 filhos menores de idade, apenas 2 frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Trabalha como engarrafadora a mais de 8 anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Pois enfrentando dificuldades para dar continuidade com a sua obra de residência solícita um empréstimo para adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, chapas e mais. Este é o seu 3º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra e adquirir uma viatura
texts.en:
Amelia comes from the province of Maputo. She's 32 years old and officially married. She has three underage children, only two of whom are in school. She's not responsible for anyone else.
She has worked as a bottler for over eight years and she spends her earnings on household expenses. Because she's been struggling to continue building her house, she's requesting a loan so that she can purchase construction supplies such as sand, cement, metal plates, etc. This is her third loan with Hluvuku.
In the future she intends to finish the construction work and buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, metal plates, etc.

loans.name: Vova

texts.en:
Vova lives with his two sons and his wife in the frontier village Khachardzan of Tavush region. Vova used to do different construction work in his village, but now he is a farmer, and he also gives taxi services with his own car about his village.  Vova’s farm is a rather rich one, and here with the help of his wife, he takes care of cows, sheep, a horse and chickens. He also cultivates potatoes on his plot of land. 

Vova’s wife makes macun (national dairy-product), cheese and curd from their farm milk and she sells it with their farm eggs, meat and potato. She sells them mainly to their villagers and regular customers. Vova finds his sheep breeding very profitable and he hopes that its development, with the help of this Kiva loan, will bring more income to his family. With the Kiva loan amount he plans to buy lambs for his farm and enlarge his sheep breeding activities.

loans.use: to buy lambs for his farm and enlarge his sheep breeding activities.

loans.name: Anatori

texts.en:
Anatori is a hardworking married man living in Kamwenge Uganda. He rears livestock alongside a retail shop to earn himself an extra income. He started this business so as to have a better standard of living. He hopes to have a big farm of cattle and be a modern farmer but faces a challenge of diseases that attack his animals. 

He is requesting a loan to buy more cows for his farm.

loans.use: to buy more cows for his farm.

loans.name: Husan

texts.ru: Хусан мужчина 54 лет. Он  женат и  отец двоих детей. Он вырос в семье рабочих и с детства знает сложности жизни. В возрасте 18 лет Хусан женился. Сейчас у него двое прекрасных детей, один из которых болеет. Жена Хусана не имеет образования, поэтому получить хорошую работу она не в состоянии. Сам Хусан  на сегодняшний день является пенсионером. В связи с этим  Хусан обратился в МДО Арванд за кредитом на лечение сына, так как у него нет полной суммы денег. Хусан надеется на одобрение его заявки и благодарит МДО Арванд за доверие и поддержку.
texts.en: Husan is a 54-year old man. He is married and has two children. He grew up in a working-class family and faced many hardships since his childhood. Husan got married at 18. Now he has two wonderful children, one of whom is ill. Husan's wife did not receive an education and therefore cannot  find good employment. As to Husan himself, he is retired at present. And thus Husan applied to the Arvand microfinance institution for a loan to pay for his son's medical treatment since he lacks the full amount needed. Husan hopes that his request will be approved and thanks Arvand in advance for its trust and support.

loans.use: to pay for his son's medical treatment.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane has been running a textile shop since 2000, along side a motorcycle transport business for additional income. She is married with three children, and she works very hard to see her children get basic needs and are able to have a fruitful future. 

With this loan, Jane will be able to buy cloths for her business expansion to satisfy her customer demands and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy cloths to sell.

loans.name: Ibtisam

texts.en:
Ibtisam is a 39-year-old, married mother of three children. Two years ago she started tailoring from her house to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their family.  Ibtisam is a hardworking, and sacrificing mother. She is very ambitious and tries hard to develop her business. 

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva field partner Al Majmoua, to open her own tailoring shop and to buy an updated tailoring machine. This loan will help Ibtisam satisfy her customers' needs and provide them with better service. Ibtisam hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to open her own tailoring shop and buy an updated tailoring machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow for milk production to increase the number of litres of milk supplied to clients.

loans.name: Salamat

texts.ru: Саламат, 35 лет, замужем, детей нет. У Саламат высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается торговлей продуктами питания, а именно кондитерскими изделиями- тортами, пирожными, печеньями и соками. Благодаря упорному труду Саламат, в ее магазине на сегодняшний день есть товар на сумму 150,000 сом (KGS).  Ежемесячный доход составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего дела, Саламат обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку товара для расширения ассортимента. Доходы от кредита Саламат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Salamat is 35 years old, married, without children. Salamat has received a college degree. As a main source of income for her family, she sells grocery items, more specifically confectionery such as cakes, pastries, cookies and juices. Thanks to Salamat's hard work, she now has a stock of wares valued at 150,000 soms (KGS) in her store. Her monthly revenue is about 20,000 KGS. In order to develop her business further, Salamat has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan in the amount of 50,000 KGS to buy more goods and expand her selection. Salamt plans to invest the resulting revenue in a further development of her business.

loans.use: to buy confectionery items for resale in her shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for planting

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick lives in Masindi, Uganda. He is a hardworking man who practices farming, and sells produce like groundnuts, beans and maize flour to boost his income.
